author: eptwts
text:
best argument against info is that almost everyone can 10x their income by applying what they already know...

this doesn't mean that info is useless, it's just overconsumed

most people simply don't act on the knowledge they already posses

instead, they're misled by their own brain into craving new information - thinking that's what's gonna help them get to that next level

in most instances it really is just acting on what you already know
